author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Team ‘RRR’ does social-distancing in style
description: SS Rajamouli, Jr NTR, MM Keeravani and Madhan Karky have taken the ‘work from home’ option to stay productive
content: Celebrities across industries have adopted various methods to cope with the 21-day lockdown period. And team Roudram Ranam Rudhiram aka RRR is no different. In order to stay productive in the time of social-distancing, team RRR comprising SS Rajamouli, Jr NTR… [+1143 chars]
